title: Artistic Weavers Zan Traditional Medallion Area Rug, 7'10" x 10', Medium Gray
features: Machine woven with a strong polypropylene/polyester blend in Turkey.
Functional medium pile can be used in any room and works just as well under furniture as it does in entryways.
This gorgeous traditional rug features an eye-catching medallion design at a fair price point.
Designed to withstand everyday wear, this rug is kid approved and pet friendly. Perfect for high traffic areas of your home such as living room, dining room, kitchen, and hallways.
Easy to clean and maintain, we recommend vacuuming regularly and spot cleaning with a clean cloth. Always test a small area first. Use of a rug pad is recommended to prevent slippage and movement.
description: Colors: Charcoal, Medium Gray, Light Gray, Cream
Colors: Charcoal, Medium Gray, Light Gray, Cream
Recommended Rooms: Living Room, Bedroom, Dining Room, Kitchen, Hallway, Foyer, Playroom, Kids Room
Recommended Rooms: Living Room, Bedroom, Dining Room, Kitchen, Hallway, Foyer, Playroom, Kids Room

Dyes, yarns and packing materials all have natural odors that are sometimes magnified after rugs are packaged. Any odors should dissipate within a week of being removed from the packaging. If your rug has a crease, we recommend laying flat or reverse rolling. Creases will disappear within 2 weeks.

Dyes, yarns and packing materials all have natural odors that are sometimes magnified after rugs are packaged. Any odors should dissipate within a week of being removed from the packaging. If your rug has a crease, we recommend laying flat or reverse rolling. Creases will disappear within 2 weeks.

Bring serenity and beautiful traditional style to your home with the Zan collection. The lustrous sheen and high/low pile make the collection comfortable and versatile. These rugs would look perfect in a living room or dining room, and their machine woven construction is both durable and soft. Made with a blend of polyester and polypropylene in Turkey. Easy to clean and maintain, we recommend vacuuming regularly and spot cleaning with a clean cloth. Always test a small area first. Use of a rug pad is recommended to prevent slippage and movement. One Year Limited Warranty.
